Bibliography description. This is another line but the same paragraph.

dm:document.template:
Bill template paragraph 1. Bill template continuation of paragraph 1. * Bill template list ** Bill template list Bill template continuation of list
Bill template verbatim

parameter.name: P1
parameter.description: This shows that the dmr namespace can be defined at any level if desired, but generated XML will always use the namespace from the top-level element. This paragraph is all on one line. This is another paragraph. * This is a list item * And another This is verbatim text So is this

parameter.name: P2
parameter.description:
This paragraph is all on one line. This is another sentence. This is the same paragraph.
This is a new paragraph. * This is a list item * And another and its continuation
This is verbatim text
This should be multi-line verbatim text (not this line!) Indented Further indented

parameter.name: P3
parameter.description:
Start of sentence: {{template|Bill}} :end of sentence.
